  "description": "Deradelight Academy is a leading digital skills and tech training hub committed to equipping young people with in-demand digital and tech skills such as Software Engineering, Data Analysis, Website Design, Cybersecurity, Data Science, Artificial Intelligenceetc..

With our training center at FUTO Campus, we&rsquo;re on a mission to make Deradelight Academy the default brand for digital skills training in FUTO and across Owerri.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales &amp; Marketing Executive

Job Location:&nbsp;Futo&nbsp;- Owerri, Imo
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	We are looking for a strategic, creative, and result-driven Sales &amp; Marketing Executive to champion our enrollment growth and visibility drive within futo&nbsp;and other university campuses around Owerri.
	Your mission is simple but powerful &mdash; to ensure steady student enrollment, high campus visibility, and make Deradelight Academy a household name for tech and digital skills training.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute marketing strategies that drive student enrollment.
	Build and maintain relationships with Course andStudent Representatives, HODs, and Lecturers across relevant departments.
	Plan and organize campus events, seminars, and bootcamps that create awareness and attract new students.
	Promote our training programs both within and outside futo&nbsp;Campus using creative on-ground and online marketing tactics.
	Collaborate with the marketing team to design and share promotional materials (flyers, social media content, digital campaigns).
	Conduct regular follow-ups with prospects and convert leads to enrolled students.
	Represent Deradelight Academy in student and campus activities to strengthen brand presence.
	Gather feedback and insights from the field to improve marketing strategies and course offerings.


Who We&rsquo;re Looking For


	Minimum of 2&ndash;3 years of proven experience in Sales, Marketing, or Business Development, preferably in the education or training sector.
	Excellent communication, persuasion, and presentation skills.
	Creative, social, and passionate about connecting with students and building relationships.
	Strong understanding of marketing (both online and offline).
	Self-motivated, goal-oriented, and able to work with minimal supervision.
	Social-media smart with a mindset to hit and exceed targets.
	Familiarity with futo&nbsp;and other university campuses in Owerriis a strong advantage.


Compensation &amp; Benefits


	Compensation is competitive and aligned with current market standards.
	Attractive performance bonuses and commissions tied to enrollments.
	Free access to selected Deradelight Academy courses.
	Career growth opportunities &mdash; potential to rise to Sales &amp; Marketing Manager as the Academy expands.
	Work in a dynamic, innovative, and youth-driven environment.


Method of Application&nbsp;

Sales & Marketing Executive Job at Deradelight Technologies




        
    

        
        Deradelight Academy is a leading digital skills and tech training hub committed to equipping young people with in-demand digital and tech skills such as Software Engineering, Data Analysis, Website Design, Cybersecurity, Data Science, Artificial Intelligenceetc..

With our training center at FUTO Campus, we’re on a mission to make Deradelight Academy the default brand for digital skills training in FUTO and across Owerri.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales & Marketing Executive

Job Location: Futo - Owerri, Imo
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a strategic, creative, and result-driven Sales & Marketing Executive to champion our enrollment growth and visibility drive within futo and other university campuses around Owerri.
	Your mission is simple but powerful — to ensure steady student enrollment, high campus visibility, and make Deradelight Academy a household name for tech and digital skills training.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute marketing strategies that drive student enrollment.
	Build and maintain relationships with Course andStudent Representatives, HODs, and Lecturers across relevant departments.
	Plan and organize campus events, seminars, and bootcamps that create awareness and attract new students.
	Promote our training programs both within and outside futo Campus using creative on-ground and online marketing tactics.
	Collaborate with the marketing team to design and share promotional materials (flyers, social media content, digital campaigns).
	Conduct regular follow-ups with prospects and convert leads to enrolled students.
	Represent Deradelight Academy in student and campus activities to strengthen brand presence.
	Gather feedback and insights from the field to improve marketing strategies and course offerings.


Who We’re Looking For


	Minimum of 2–3 years of proven experience in Sales, Marketing, or Business Development, preferably in the education or training sector.
	Excellent communication, persuasion, and presentation skills.
	Creative, social, and passionate about connecting with students and building relationships.
	Strong understanding of marketing (both online and offline).
	Self-motivated, goal-oriented, and able to work with minimal supervision.
	Social-media smart with a mindset to hit and exceed targets.
	Familiarity with futo and other university campuses in Owerriis a strong advantage.


Compensation & Benefits


	Compensation is competitive and aligned with current market standards.
	Attractive performance bonuses and commissions tied to enrollments.
	Free access to selected Deradelight Academy courses.
	Career growth opportunities — potential to rise to Sales & Marketing Manager as the Academy expands.
	Work in a dynamic, innovative, and youth-driven environment.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a brief cover letter to: deradelightacademy.com using "Application – Sales & Marketing Executive"  as the subject of the mail.

Personal Assistant Job at Zaron Cosmetics




        
    

        
        Zaron Cosmetics is Africa’s leading cosmetics brand dedicated to the enhancement of the well-being and quality of life of all people through the development, marketing, distribution, and sale of quality lifestyle products. The brand was conceived in Leeds, United Kingdom in 2010 and began operations in Lagos Nigeria in September 2011. The Zaron brand trades under the names of Zaron International Limited, Zaron Cosmetics Limited and Zaron Hair Products Limited. Together we develop and promote our own brand of lifestyle products, manufactured to international standards and customized to different environmental conditions and for people of colour.

Job Position: Personal Assistant
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
